title: Fish: the food with a catch to it
brief_description: Overview of the scope of the fishing industry: identifies the world’s leading fishing nations and illustrates the immense variety of fish caught. Traditional and modern methods of locating, catching, processing and preserving seafoods are shown. Also investigates the expanding activity in aquaculture or “fish farming”.
